description: OpenAI's new "ChatGPT search" Chrome extension feels like nothing more than a typical search hijacker, changing Chrome's settings so your address bar searches go through ChatGPT Search instead. [...]
title: OpenAI's new ChatGPT Search Chrome extension feels like a search hijacker

description: Synology, a Taiwanese network-attached storage (NAS) appliance maker, patched two critical zero-days exploited during last week's Pwn2Own hacking competition within days. [...]
title: Synology hurries out patches for zero-days exploited at Pwn2Own

description: The Dstat.cc DDoS review platform has been seized by law enforcement, and two suspects have been arrested after the service helped fuel distributed denial-of-service attacks for years. [...]
title: DDoS site Dstat.cc seized and two suspects arrested in Germany
